means: 使麻木( benumb的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Age stole onward and benumbed me more and more.
sentence.Network_cn: 年纪渐老使得我(反应)越来越迟钝.

sentence.Network_en: The old lady was benumbed by grief.
The recollection loosened a throng of benumbed sensations.
sentence.Network_cn: 往日的回忆使已麻木的各种感觉一同涌上心头.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) -亿城英语 ... benumb 失去感觉 benumbed 麻木的 Benz 奔驰汽车.
a boring performance benumbed the audience ;, 使观众目眩乏味的表演;
The girl was benumbed with cold ., 那女孩冷得麻木了.

list.abs: the product has three poison effects of inner absorber , touch-kill and stomach poison . the pesticide benumbs pests' nervous centralis to kill them in short time .该产品具有内吸、触杀、胃毒三种毒杀作用，药剂进入虫体后使害虫的中枢神经麻痹而迅速死亡。
The homeless was benumbed with cold ., 那个无家可归者被冻僵了.
the benumbed intellectual faculties can no longer respond ., 僵化的知识才能不能再引起回应.
The benumbed intellectual faculties can no longer respond ., 僵化的知识分子团队再也无法做出回应.

in his 14-year , 30-film career , Asano has shot , stabbed , maimed , tortured and gone in for more than a little self-inflicted pain , and done it all wearing a benumbed expression and smug smirk .在浅野13年中的33部电影里，他中过枪、挨过刀、残废过、受过折磨还品尝过自残的剧烈痛苦，而且每次脸上都挂着那种麻木

means.word_mean: 2. having lost or been caused to lose interest because of overexposure;

sentences.sentence: "the mind of the audience is becoming dulled"
"the benumbed intellectual faculties can no longer respond"
